duties_responsibilities.duty: Fulfilling general labor duties and gradually acquiring skills such as safe removal of lead paint, wood finishing, glass glazing, detailed painting, weatherstripping, wood repairs, and fabrication.

Performing physically and mentally demanding work on historic properties and in a workshop, with heavy lifting, precise and repetitive movements, standing for extended periods, and using respirators for a portion of the work.

education_certification.credential: No previous experience required, but a passion for growing and learning in a new hands-on craft, respect for hard work, and a very conscientious, detail-oriented mindset.
